title: Create website for Akashic Record practitioner and energy healer

requirements.text: Create a homepage with hero section introducing the Akashic Record practitioner and energy healer services, including a welcoming headline, brief description of offerings, and call-to-action button

quotes: create a website for akashic record practioner and energy healer

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays a hero section with headline and description
Call-to-action button is prominently displayed
Content clearly introduces Akashic Records and energy healing services

requirements.text: Create an About page describing what Akashic Records are, the healing methodology, and the practitioner's background and qualifications

quotes: create a website for akashic record practioner and energy healer

acceptanceCriteria: About page explains Akashic Records concept clearly
Page includes practitioner biography and credentials
Healing approach and methodology are described

requirements.text: Create a Services page listing available healing sessions, including Akashic Record readings, energy healing sessions, and any combined offerings with descriptions and duration information

quotes: create a website for akashic record practioner and energy healer

acceptanceCriteria: Services page lists all available session types
Each service includes description and duration
Page is organized and easy to navigate

requirements.text: Create a booking or contact form where visitors can request appointments or ask questions, capturing name, email, phone number, preferred service, and message

quotes: create a website for akashic record practioner and energy healer

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form collects name, email, phone, service type, and message
Form validates required fields
Form submissions are stored in backend
User receives confirmation after successful submission

requirements.text: Implement backend storage for contact form submissions including timestamp, contact details, requested service, and message content

quotes: create a website for akashic record practioner and energy healer

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores all form submission data
Submissions include timestamp and unique identifier
Data persists across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Create a testimonials or reviews section displaying client feedback about healing sessions and Akashic Record readings

quotes: create a website for akashic record practioner and energy healer

acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section displays client reviews
Each testimonial shows client name and feedback
Section is visually appealing and credible

requirements.text: Implement responsive navigation menu with links to Home, About, Services, Testimonials, and Contact pages

quotes: create a website for akashic record practioner and energy healer

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu is present on all pages
Menu is responsive and works on mobile devices
Active page is visually indicated in navigation

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual design with a calming, spiritual aesthetic featuring earthy tones (sage green, soft gold, warm neutrals), elegant serif typography for headings, and ethereal design elements that evoke healing and mysticism throughout the entire site
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses earthy, calming tones consistently
Typography creates a spiritual, professional atmosphere
Design elements reflect healing and mystical themes
Visual style is consistent across all pages

constraints: Use single-actor Motoko architecture for backend
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui)
Use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query for frontend

required: Ethereal hero background image with soft light rays and sacred geometry patterns suggesting spiritual energy (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Akashic Records symbol or mystical book icon for services section (akashic-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Energy healing hands illustration with glowing aura effect (healing-hands.dim_512x512.png)
